channel.title: Crafting
channel.description: I'm working on crafting and if you have all the moulds on you when you make the final product you get the ring, amulet and necklace. I'm trying to fix that but I don't know how. I have this part. The code says if you use a sapphire on a furnace and you have the moulds... What would I do to halt anything that happens after this. [code] if (UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 1607 && playerHasItem(1592) && playerHasItem(1595) && playerHasItem(1597))[/code]

item.title: Crafting
item.dc:creator: @Hellz_Scape Hellz Scape
item.description:
@Hellz_Scape wrote:

I just used else

Read full topic

item.title: Crafting
item.dc:creator: @Chemist Chemist
item.description:
@Chemist wrote:

[quote=“Hellz Scape, post:1, topic:306891”]I’m working on crafting and if you have all the moulds on you when you make the final product you get the ring, amulet and necklace. I’m trying to fix that but I don’t know how. I have this part.
The code says if you use a sapphire on a furnace and you have the moulds… What would I do to halt anything that happens after this.

if (UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 1607 && playerHasItem(1592) && playerHasItem(1595) && playerHasItem(1597))[/quote]

Try doing seperate thingymawatsits like
if (usedonobject == blah && itemid == blah @@ playerhasitem 1592)
if (usedonobject == blah && itemid == blah @@ playerhasitem 2592)
if (usedonobject == blah && itemid == blah @@ playerhasitem 3592)

Read full topic
